tasks.title: Project Dependencies & Environment Setup
tasks.description: Install and configure all necessary dependencies for authentication system
tasks.details: Install Supabase dependencies, validation libraries, and configure environment variables

tasks.title: Database Schema Setup
tasks.description: Create Supabase database tables and security policies for user management
tasks.details: Create profiles table with fields for user data, professional info, and verification status. Set up Row Level Security policies for data protection

tasks.title: Authentication Components
tasks.description: Build comprehensive authentication UI components including login, signup, and password reset forms
tasks.details: Create reusable auth components with proper validation, error handling, and accessibility features

tasks.title: User Profile Management
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive user profile creation and management system
tasks.details: Build profile forms, image upload functionality, and profile viewing/editing capabilities

tasks.title: Professional Verification System
tasks.description: Implement professional verification and credential validation system
tasks.details: Build verification request forms, admin approval workflows, and verification badge display system

tasks.title: Authentication Middleware & Protection
tasks.description: Implement Next.js middleware for route protection and authentication state management
tasks.details: Create middleware for protected routes, auth context providers, and session management

subtasks.title: Create Auth Context Provider
subtasks.description: Implement React Context for client-side authentication state management with user data, loading states, and auth methods
subtasks.details: Create AuthContext and AuthProvider components to manage authentication state across the application, including user session, loading states, and authentication methods

subtasks.title: Create Custom Auth Hooks
subtasks.description: Implement useAuth and other custom hooks for easy access to authentication state and methods in components
subtasks.details: Create custom React hooks like useAuth, useRequireAuth, and useUser to provide easy access to authentication state, user data, and auth methods throughout the application

subtasks.title: Create Auth Guard Components
subtasks.description: Implement ProtectedRoute and AuthGuard components for client-side route protection
subtasks.details: Create reusable components to protect routes and sections of the application, with proper loading states and redirect handling for unauthenticated users

subtasks.title: Enhance Dashboard with Auth Integration
subtasks.description: Update dashboard and navigation components to use the new auth context and display user information
subtasks.details: Integrate the auth context into the dashboard layout, add user menu with profile/logout options, and update navigation to show authenticated user state

tasks.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing strategy for authentication flows and components
tasks.details: Create unit tests, integration tests, and E2E tests for auth system

tasks.title: Security & Data Protection
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures and data protection protocols
tasks.details: Set up encryption, secure storage, data validation, and privacy compliance measures

tasks.title: Email & Notification System
tasks.description: Implement email verification, password reset, and notification system for authentication flows
tasks.details: Set up email templates, SMTP configuration, and notification triggers for auth events

tasks.title: Documentation & Deployment
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and deploy authentication system to production
tasks.details: Document authentication flows, API endpoints, security measures, and deploy to production environment
